summary: This is a memorandum from the Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General (OIG) documenting a voluntary interview conducted on March 16, 2022, with a Federal Bureau of Prisons Lieutenant regarding the death of inmate Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York in August 2019. The memorandum references attached interview transcripts and documents related to the investigation.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate whose death at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York in August 2019 is the subject of the OIG investigation.

persons.name: Lieutenant
persons.context: A BOP Lieutenant from the MCC New York Office of Special Investigative Services who was interviewed by the OIG on March 16, 2022, regarding the circumstances surrounding Jeffrey Epstein's death.

persons.name: Assistant Special Agent in Charge
persons.role: Assistant Special Agent in Charge, OIG
persons.context: An OIG official who, along with a Special Agent, conducted the voluntary interview of the BOP Lieutenant on March 16, 2022.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: An OIG official who, along with the Assistant Special Agent in Charge, conducted the voluntary interview of the BOP Lieutenant on March 16, 2022.

connections.description: The Lieutenant was a staff member at the MCC New York where Epstein was housed as an inmate prior to his death.
The OIG Assistant Special Agent in Charge interviewed the BOP Lieutenant as part of the investigation into Epstein's death.
The OIG Special Agent interviewed the BOP Lieutenant as part of the investigation into Epstein's death.

events.title: OIG Interview of BOP Lieutenant
events.description: The Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General conducted a voluntary, recorded interview of a BOP Lieutenant regarding the death of Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Jeffrey Epstein's Death Investigation

events.title: Epstein Housed at MCC New York

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, New York
Metropolitan Detention Center, Brooklyn, New York
keyFacts: The Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General (OIG) conducted an investigation into the death of Federal Bureau of Prisons inmate Jeffrey Epstein.
A BOP Lieutenant from the MCC New York Office of Special Investigative Services was interviewed on March 16, 2022, as part of this investigation.
Epstein was housed at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York in July and August 2019 under Register Number 76318-054.
The memorandum references several attached documents, including the interview transcript, an August 10, 2019 memorandum by the Lieutenant, and MCC New York records from August 9, 2019.
The document is an internal OIG memorandum containing neither recommendations nor conclusions, and is marked for limited official use.
